ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Very slow after DirectX 9 patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Did you have XP Pro or Home? I ve always heard that XP Home wasn t very game friendly . My husband used to have Home on his computer and almost no games would
ygData.messageBody:
Did you have XP Pro or Home? I've always heard that XP
Home wasn't very "game friendly". My husband used to
have Home on his computer and almost no games would
work with it. XP Pro is much better for handling
games.

--- Justin <pavisoj@...> wrote:
> I use an AMD athalon thunderbird chip running
> 1.33 GHrz, 512 MB RAM, and a geforce4 TI 4200 64 mb
> video and I use win ME. I used to run Win xp but it
> crashed my sytem twice wthin two days of the os
> being loaded on my system. It didn'tlike the
> scanner drivermade for win xp and the crit update
> wouldn't take to my system. I also have a custom
> built system not any store brand. any suggestions i
> shouldc use loading win xp on my system like what
> file version should I use nt or fat 32? thanks any
> help would be good. By the way the athatlon
> thundrbird is the equivelent of the P3 chip.
> Justin
